situation.title: Concerts
situation.meta_description: Concerts are not allowed to take place.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Concerts and other art performances are allowed to take place but still with no audience present. Rehearsals are allowed. 

It is, for example, possible to stream a concert online, without the presence of the audience.

During the rehearsal or performance it is necessary to observe several measures:

  • wear your face masks all the time except the exact time of rehearsal or concert performance
  • in case singing takes place in the performance or on a rehearsal, the number of people present on the stage is limited. The exact calculation of a maximum number of persons allowed to sing on the stage equals the stage area (in square meters) divided by four.
  • when playing musical instruments distancing of at least 1,2 meters from other members of the group is mandatory. Every performer is obliged to have his own music stand.

This significantly affects the economic situation of theatres, actors, and other staff. Compensation for the effects of these measures is intended to mitigate this intervention.

questions_answers.question: We're planning a tour for next year. Will it be possible to hold concerts in the spring?
questions_answers.value: Unfortunately, we don't know yet what measures will be necessary in spring. However, the measures for events taking place outside are being relaxed earlier than the ones taking place inside, where the risk of transmission is higher.
